name: Life Is Strange: Aftermath
description:
At the climax of the storm, Maxine Caulfield is presented with an impossible decision. Save all of the innocent Arcadia Bay people, or sacrifice the person she loves most? Polarized, Maxine takes her decision… but what will be of the Aftermath? 

Life is Strange: Aftermath is a visual novel that explores the questions that the Life is Strange game left us with after sacrificing Chloe. Would Max have new romantic interests? New friends? How would she cope with her trauma? All of these questions and more are portrayed in our visual novel. 

  • 20,000+ words Chapter 1
  • 22 unique sprites with a distinctive style
  • A custom made CG 
  • Decisions with new and different scenes for all of them. 

The game currently finds itself in the demo stage, so not everything that you see here is representative of the final game. As we get more art and more chapters are done we will update the game and upload it, all for free! 

Haven't played the Life is Strange games before? We'll give you a quick rundown at the beginning so you can enjoy! ❤️

Thank you so much for checking out our game and playing it if you did! Any comments, questions or recommendations please, be sure to let us know either down in the comments or at @RZoneStudios on Twitter! 

https://ko-fi.com/retrozonestudios

If you want to go the extra mile and help us monetarily we would be extremely thankful! Any and all donations will go right back into our game, check our patreon and Twitter to see what we plan to do with that. 

Ultimately, we hope to bring some love to some of the characters of this lovely franchise, and we hope to bring you all an amazing experience! Thank you for giving us your time, and please enjoy the game! ❤️

We do NOT claim to have ownership of the characters for the Life Is Strange series of games, they are all owned by their respective companies.
